title: Market Simulation Engine
shortDes: A high-performance market simulation engine for simulation financial markets end-to-end.
longDes: Built a market exchange featuring a custom order-matching engine that manages the order book using heaps and ensures database persistence. Optimized for low latency by parallelizing per-stock execution with multithreading (C++, SQLite). Simulated the complete market workflow, including a TCP exchange server, a UDP transaction recorder with an HTTP API for historical prices, and a terminal UI for real-time quotes and chart upyears (C++, Python, Docker).

title: Prescriptive LLM Agent for Enterprise Optimization
shortDes: A domain adaptable, causal and prescriptive tool-equipped LLM agent for enterprise resource optimization.
longDes: Designed an agent leveraging causal and prescriptive reasoning tools with natural follow-ups using LangChain. Trained large language models with parameter-efficient fine-tuning techniques such as prompt tuning and adapters, achieving an 11% improvement in downstream task accuracy. Translated research on hallucination mitigation and intent recognition into production-ready pipelines in Python, generalized for enterprise-scale use cases.

title: Rent Price Predictor CNN
shortDes: A convolutional neural network to predict rent prices from Boston apartment images.
longDes: CNN to predict rental prices by integrating structured (location, year built) and unstructured (Google Street View images) data. Made using PyTorch and OpenCV.

title: Smart Rockets
shortDes: Reinforcement learning project using genetic algorithms to evolve rocket path-finding.
longDes: Reinforcement learning project using genetic algorithms to evolve rocket path-finding.

title: Our Space
shortDes: A collaborative site for crowdsourcing community requests.
longDes: ðŸŽ¯OurSpace enables crowdsourced service requests of communal spaces, and thus provides a domain where users can share their opinions and amplify their unspoken ideas- as well as discover new spaces within their community. ðŸŽ¯OurSpace strives to serve as a tool to collect voices and ideas about the 90% of issues about community spaces that are often missed due to a lack of community platform.

title: AirChat
longDes: AirChat is a lightweight chat application that allows users to create and join chat rooms, send messages, and share files in real-time. Built with React for the frontend and Node.js with Socket.io for the backend, AirChat provides a seamless and interactive user experience.

title: Path Finding Visualizer
shortDes: A visualizer for breadth-first-search pathfinding algorithm.
longDes: This project involves creating a visual representation of the breadth-first-search (BFS) algorithm to find the shortest path in a grid. Users can set start and end points, create obstacles, and watch the algorithm explore the grid in real-time. Built using P5js.

title: Flooding Simulation
shortDes: Flooding model simulations to predict flood scenarios.
longDes: This project involves analyzing and flood simulations to asses damage to campus and surrounding urban areas. Using GIS data with ArcGIS and flooding models, we identified $600M+ of potential flood risk damages to university property from the '100 year' simulation. Designed a Python package for reading and visualizing 300+ specialized geodata files (SciPy, matplotlib, NumPy) and engineered data filters and custom compression, reducing geodata storage by 99.99% (1.1TB to 1MB).

title: Covid19 Cases Predictor
shortDes: A model to predict Covid19 cases.
longDes: This project involves using regression models to predict Covid19 cases using various data sources and machine learning techniques.

title: Android Paint App
shortDes: A simple drawing app for Android devices.
longDes: This project involves creating a drawing application for Android devices using Java and the Android SDK. Users can draw on the screen, choose colors, and save their artwork.

title: AI Tic Tac Toe
shortDes: A simple AI-powered Tic Tac Toe game.
longDes: This project involves creating a Tic Tac Toe game where players can compete against an 'AI' using the minimax algorithm with alpha-beta pruning.

title: Planet Defender
shortDes: A game to defend planets from asteroids. Just for fun!
longDes: This project involves creating a game where players must defend their planet from incoming asteroids. Extremely simple game made to entertain some kids I was babysitting. Built using P5js.
